column4: Greetings - I just downloaded the i386 6.06 alternat iso from the website and burned it but it doesn't appear to be a bootable CD. Is there a way to get it to boot? I've got a IBM boot CD with a "boot:" prompt...any ideas?
what happens when you boot w/ the disk in?
have you checked that the cd drive is the first boot device in bios?
what does the contents look like?
